item.title: Simple State Management in Javascript
item.description: I’ve gotten a bit tired of dependencies. Perhaps that’s a bit ironic for somebody who does most of his work using javascript frameworks. But after spending yet another chunk of hours trying to upgrade Angular I’ve come to think there must be a better way of building software that doesn’t involve 1000s of node_modules dependencies. At the same time I’ve been thinking about programming games in Javascript. This isn’t exactly a new idea in 2019, but after 10 years of web development I still haven’t made a game.
